Html:
Can it run in Windows XP?

if it works, under XP does it need Windows 7 SDK runtime?

because, my application also must run in XP.

Not this version as this is just a wrapper around what is provided by Microsoft in the Windows 7 SDK, so it requires Win 7 or Vista SP2 with a Platform Upgrade installed.

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd371191%28v=VS.85%29.aspx
